entry.content:
For my conference in 2022, I released some MetaHats ðŸ§¢, and everything was sold out; then I ordered some more, and they were sold out again. Long story short, more than 1000 MetaHats were sold. Insane!

Owners of the hats had guaranteed access to the conference and unlimited high-fives by me.

No new hats like these will be issued so if you have one, consider yourself lucky :D
